title: Ep. 316: The Truth About Sun-Protective Clothing & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 316: The Truth About Sun-Protective Clothing & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:subtitle: What is UPF clothing and how does it actually protect you from UV rays? So glad you asked! We explain the technology, tell you about some of our favorite brands, and share an easy hack for making your own sun-protective clothing at home. We also chat a...
description:
What is UPF clothing and how does it actually protect you from UV rays? So glad you asked! We explain the technology, tell you about some of our favorite brands, and share an easy hack for making your own sun-protective clothing at home. We also chat about #cryptocosmetics from e.l.f. Cosmetics; sunscreen-scented dog-poop bags (?!); a Lisa Frank lawsuit; the Environmental Working Group's product-labeling initiative; Scarlett Johansson's beauty line; and animal-friendly news at major fashion labels, including Canada Goose. Plus, a listener tells us about her must-have eyeshadow and we Raise A Wand to our favorite products of the week.-- Become a Fat Mascara+ member to listen to the podcast without ads: fatmascara.com/member; Episode recap: fatmascara.com/blog; To shop products from this episode: myshlf.us/fatmascara; Our private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To submit a "Raise A Wand" product recommendation & be featured on a future episode: +1 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
